name: arrows earwarmer
notes:
**this is a pay what you want pattern! use the code arrows50 for 50% off the original price or use the code arrows100 for a free copy. if you download for free, i’d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️. thank you for your support!

the arrow earwarmer is a cozy, textured accessory that combines warmth and style in one quick-to-make project. featuring a bold arrow pattern, this earwarmer is crafted using thick yarn, allowing it to come together in no time at all. its chunky design not only makes it an eye-catching piece but also ensures it keeps you toasty on those colder days. perfect for crochet enthusiasts of all levels, the arrow earwarmer is a fun, fast project that delivers a stylish result with minimal effort.

this pattern is made in super bulky weight yarn with a 8mm hook. i recommend choosing a natural or synthetic fiber—not something plant based as that won’t be as warm. this earwarmer is worked flat in a stitch repeat that gives a ribbed, rich texture. you work it flat from bottom up and then seam the ends together.

this pattern is written for 3 sizes, adult s, m, and l. you can easily adjust the fit to your preference by adding or subtracting rows and/or changing the stitch count. size s should fit any kids above 10. the instructions will be shown like this..s,(m),(l). if there is only one number, that is for all sizes.

this is a beginner friendly pattern, it utilizes basic stitches and the stitch repeat is easy to memorize and work up. it includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions.

**measurements**

s: 17” circumference and 3.75” width.
m: 19” circumference and 4” width.
l: 21” circumference and 4.25” width.
